entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
